secret.title: Secrets generation
secret.copy: Copy and store these secrets safe, they will allow you to identify a machine through API

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to generate new secrets?
confirm.body: Previous secrets will be revoked and services using them will no longer be authorized until you update them
